title: E-commerce-Management
description: Multi-Role System: Create a multi-role system with roles such as customer, shop manager, and system admin, each with specific access and permissions.React for building dynamic user interfaces.Tailwind CSS for modern and responsive styling. Stripe js for payment. MongoDb, express & node for server

title: Softnee-Electronic-Brandshop
description: React for building dynamic user interfaces.Tailwind CSS for modern and responsive styling MongoDB for streamlined data storage.Express and Node.js for a robust, scalable server.Firebase for secure user authentication User can add a product & customer can cart them. use category based data & display them

title: Birthday-Event-Management
description: The website is designed to be fully responsive with various devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. Users can create accounts, log in, and enjoy a personalized experience. Display username & image after logge in. also emplement Social Media Login. Users can view detailed information about our event planning services. emplement error page & a contact form.

title: Portfolio Website
description: My portfolio website is designed to provide an immersive and responsive experience for visitors. It comprises several sections, including a beautiful homepage, an about page detailing my skills and background, a contact section with an EmailJS-powered form, and a showcase of my frontend projects
